2023.name: My Portfolio
2023.description: A place for my own on the internet, somewhere I can really express myself and show what I'm capable of. That was what I wanted to create with this portfolio. A place that really feels like me.
2023.purpose: The site you're on right now is my own space that will serve as proof of my capabilities. It's a place where people are free to discover me and a place for me as a developer to show what I've made.

2023.name: FSHN
2023.teaser: A new way of fitting clothes
2023.description: FSHN is a project where people are encouraged to try a new way of fitting clothes. By using body tracking and machine learning, images of the clothes you choose are projected onto your body.
2023.purpose: This project was my final as a student at the Thomas More university of applied sciences. It combined all the knowledge and more that I had learned there throug the years.

2023.name: E-commerce platform
2023.description: This fully complete webshop with a PHP back-end and Vue front-end is a place where people can freely create items to sell and where all items can be bought. It's a fully complete webshop for everyone to use.
2023.purpose: This e-commerce webshop has been made as a project during my internship at Artcore Society. In just 10 weeks, I built it from scratch together with Ismaïl El Ghamri

2023.name: Stikr website
2023.teaser: An alternative to the current one
2023.description: I created this website in the same style and with the same brand as my summer job's place. I used their branding and tried my best to come up with a slightly altered version of their website.
2023.purpose: This project was made by me to try my hand at the Nuxt JS meta framework. It was my first project that utilized this, and as such it's more about the way of wrting code than it is about content and design.

2022.name: Donuttello configurator
2022.description: A place where people can create their own donut virtually and maybe even share it with others. That was the target goal for this application. A 3D vibe was added for a bigger 'wow' effect for the users.
2022.purpose: This project was offered to me by donuttello as part of one of my courses at school. They wanted a new way to let people interact with donuts and a new way of marketeering their brand and name.

2022.name: IMT
2022.description: IMT is a marketplace created with the intention of letting people buy & sell NFT’s. It’s based on the Ethereum blockchain and uses a combination of Laravel, templating an blockchain as a way to allow for all this to work.
2022.purpose: IMT was my first ever project where I used a blockchain as a way of transfering (imaginary) funds. This marketplace was my final project for one of my courses at Thomas More.
